sentences.en: As far as I can tell, Jason is basically a nice guy.
sentences.cn: 据我所知，贾森算得上是个好人。

sentences.en: But Jason showed that he was able to conquer his fears.
sentences.cn: 但是詹森说他能够战胜恐惧.

sentences.en: Everyone knew each other well, except for the new guy Jason, who was the joker in the pack.
sentences.cn: 除了那个新来的家伙贾森, 大家彼此都很了解, 只有他让人捉摸不透.

sentences.en: He is Jason , who by courage and sharp wits, fleeced the Colchians of their golden ram.
sentences.cn: 那是哲孙, 他用勇气和智慧使得科尔奇斯人失去了公羊.

sentences.en: Jason had helped him out with a series of loans, until he could get back on an even keel.
sentences.cn: 贾森接连借了几笔钱给他，在他重新走上正轨之前帮他渡过了难关。

sentences.en: Jason had taken off his jacket and loosened his tie.
sentences.cn: 贾森已经脱下夹克，松开了领带。

sentences.en: Jason heard the reverberation of the slammed door.
sentences.cn: 贾森听到了门砰然关上的回响。

sentences.en: Jason was away on a business trip.
Jason: No, I just want to accumulate some useful experience there.
sentences.cn: 杰森:不想，我只想在那里积累一些有用的经验。

sentences.en: Jason: So, can you help me to do this work?
sentences.cn: 杰森: 那么你能帮我做这个工作吗？

sentences.en: Jason's new toy train is his pride and joy.
sentences.cn: 简森新买的玩具火车是他得意的东西.

sentences.en: May I speak to Mr. Jason Pearson of the Overseas Sales Division?
sentences.cn: 我要跟海外销售部的JasonPearson先生讲话.

sentences.en: She handed the cigar back to Jason with a self-satisfied smile.
sentences.cn: 她得意地笑着把雪茄给贾森递了回去。

sentences.en: She'd need proof to bring Jason to justice.
sentences.cn: 她需要有证据才能将贾森绳之以法。

sentences.en: Two months before she gave birth to Jason she left work feeling on top of the world.
sentences.cn: 生贾森前的两个月，她辞工回家，感觉无比幸福。

sentences.en: We asked Jason to write an essay about his hometown and about his place in it.
sentences.cn: 我们让贾森写一篇有关他的家乡和他自己的家的短文。

sentences.en: We asked Jason to write an essay about his hometown.
sentences.cn: 我们让贾森写一篇有关他的家乡的短文。

phrases.tran_cn: n. 贾森·威廉姆斯（美国篮球明星）
